name: @wasmer/io-devices-lib-assemblyscript
description: Library for interacting with the Wasmer Experimental IO Devices in AssemblyScript

scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized && npm run asbuild:quick-start
scripts.asbuild:untouched: asc debug-example/index.ts -b debug-example/build/untouched.wasm -t debug-example/build/untouched.wat --sourceMap --validate --debug --use abort=wasi_abort --runtime stub
scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc debug-example/index.ts -b debug-example/build/optimized.wasm -t debug-example/build/optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize --use abort=wasi_abort --runtime stub
scripts.asbuild:quick-start: asc quick-start/graphics.ts -b quick-start/build/optimized.wasm -t quick-start/build/optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize --use abort=wasi_abort --runtime stub

author: Wasmer Engineering Team <engineering@wasmer.io>
